short_summary: Air Charter Services for Northern Ontario
description: The purpose of this contract is to charter a helicopter and arrange the crew, fuel, and logistics to support the Canadian Wildlife Service (CWS) in conducting wild bird and owl surveys in northern Ontario.
full_summary: Title:** Aerial Services for Northern Ontario Bird Surveys Description: Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) is seeking the provision of helicopter charter services in Northern Ontario for the purpose of conducting bird surveys. The services will include the provision of a helicopter of sufficient capacity, flight crew, and equipment for the surveys. Contract Details: * Contract Period: August 1, 2024 to March 31, 2025, with an option to extend for a one-year period * Area of Operation: Northern Ontario * Number of Passengers: Four crew members with field and survey equipment Service Requirements:** * The contractor must provide a helicopter that is certified to transport one ton of cargo, with a minimum range of 250 nautical miles and an internal cargo capacity of at least 29 cubic feet. * The helicopter must be equipped with a satellite phone, GPS and satellite flight tracking system, as well as a communication system capable of contact with the ground crew at all times. * The contractor must also provide a pilot-in-command with a minimum of 3,000 flying hours, including at least 2,000 hours in an AS350-B2 helicopter. * The contractor must also have a plan in place for replacing the pilot-in-command in the event of an emergency or illness, as well as a plan for replacing and repairing the helicopter. Logs and Reporting:** * The contractor must provide daily GPS tracklogs from the helicopter and GPS waypoints of remote fuel cache locations. * The contractor must also provide regular reports on fuel consumption. Accommodation and Logistical Requirements:** * The contractor must coordinate accommodations and meals for the crew during positioning, de-positioning, and during periods when the field camp is accessible by road from commercial accommodations. * The contractor will be reimbursed in accordance with Natural Resources Canada's travel directives. Closing Date:** July 15, 2024 at 15:00 EST Contact:** Heidi Noble at heidi.noble@ec.gc.ca or 289-348-2015 Attachments: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40024/5000078447_en.pdf https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40024/5000078447-1_en.pdf This invitation is issued as part of the Canadian Federal Government's national procurement program.
